TopicTitle: B9 Aerospace RCS thrusters, landing gear & air brakes.

Articles.Content: Hi does anyone have a nice compact file to share with just those parts from b9 in it? I would appreciate it a lot. Thanks.
Download B9. Delete the parts you don't want. Done. It's CC-BY-NC-SA 3.0, so redistributing such modifications is fine as long as you keep the same license and don't charge money.
